materials: Cell Phones; CD/DVD/Blu-ray/UHD discs; Computer (Reuse); Computer Monitors; Computer (Recycling); Video Game Systems; Eyeglasses; Greeting Cards; Inkjet Cartridge Refilling; Inkjet Printer Cartridges; Office Equipment; Packing Peanut (Reuse); Batteries (Rechargeable); Alkaline/Single-Use Batteries; Televisions; Laser Toner Refilling; Laser Toner Cartridges; Printers/Scanners/Fax Machines; Laptop Computers; Tablets; MP3 Players; Computer Peripherals; Writing Instruments; VCRs; DVD Players/Blu-Ray Players/DVRs; Electronics; Small Electronics; Small Televisions; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes:
Located between ShopKo and Piggly Wiggly in Pinetree Plaza (Hwy 50), 1424 E. Geneva St.
We are a Wisconsin State Certified Collector.
No charge for most items, $15 charge for each tubed TV.
Collection location of Campbells soup labels, milk caps for kids, box tops for education, Walworth county McDonalds receipts, Walworth county Sentry receipts, used stamps, soda pop tabs, tennis balls, writing pens, packing peanuts, egg cartons, cancelled postage stamps, used greeting cards, Nestle water bottle labels, broken crayons, faded or torn US flags, and more.
